help.title: Help & FAQ
help.subtitle: Answers to common questions about MVGA Wallet.
help.faq1a: MVGA (Make Venezuela Great Again) is a community-owned DeFi protocol on Solana. It provides zero-fee remittances, staking rewards, P2P trading, and humanitarian grants for Venezuelans.
help.faq2a: Share your wallet address or QR code with the sender. They can send SOL, USDC, USDT, or MVGA tokens directly. Funds arrive in seconds with minimal fees on Solana.
help.faq3a: Stake your MVGA tokens to earn rewards. Choose a lock period for higher APY — 30-day, 90-day, or 180-day locks earn 1.5x, 2x, or 3x rewards respectively. Flexible staking has no lock.
help.faq4q: How do I use P2P trading?
help.faq4a: Go to P2P Exchange to buy or sell crypto with Zelle, Venmo, PayPal, or bank transfer. Trades use an escrow system — crypto is locked until both parties confirm the fiat payment.
help.faq5q: How do I create a grant proposal?
help.faq5a: Navigate to Grants and tap 'Propose'. You need staked MVGA to create a proposal. Describe your Venezuelan business, set a funding amount, and the community votes with their staked tokens.
help.faq6a: MVGA charges a small fee on swaps and P2P trades. 100% of fees go back to the community: staking rewards, liquidity, humanitarian grants, and token burns. Zero goes to founders.
